title: iPhone Car Key feature now available for some 2022 Kia and Genesis vehicles
content:
One of the most interesting and limited features available within the iOS ecosystem is Car Key. Launched in 2020, only a limited number of BMW models could be unlocked with the owner’s iPhone and Apple Watch. Now, Apple is expanding this feature to some Kia and Genesis vehicles.

more…

The post iPhone Car Key feature now available for some 2022 Kia and Genesis vehicles appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After almost two years, iPhone Car Key feature has its first expansion to vehicles beyond BMW with some Kia and Genesis models.
